en: You look nice with your hair short.
zh: 你剪短发很好看。

en: Your short hair suits you.
zh: 你很适合短发。

en: You had better have your hair cut.
zh: 你最好去剪个头发。

en: I'd like you to cut my hair.
zh: 我想请你帮我剪头发。

en: I've got to fix my hair.
zh: 我得整理一下我的头发。

en: You should go and have your hair cut.
zh: 你应该去剪个头发。

en: I used a ribbon to tie my hair into a ponytail.
zh: 我用丝带把头发扎成马尾辫。

en: I have to comb my hair.
zh: 我得梳头。

en: The other boys teased him when he got his hair cut.
zh: 他剪了头发后，其他的男孩都嘲笑他。

en: I have had my hair cut shoulder length.
zh: 我把头发剪到了齐肩的长度。

en: They look alike except for the color of their hair.
zh: 他们长得很像，除了头发的颜色。

en: She touched her hair. It was wet.
zh: 她摸了摸她的头发，湿漉漉的。

en: Look at the girl whose hair is long.
zh: 看看那个头发很长的女孩。

en: My hair is greasy.
zh: 我的头发很油。

en: My haircut only cost 1,000 yen. That's pretty rare these days. He probably didn't have a license.
zh: 我剪头发只花了1000日元。这在现在很少见。他可能没有执照。

en: Just brush your hair.
zh: 梳梳你的头发就行了。

en: My hair has grown out.
zh: 我的头发长长了。

en: I saw a girl whose hair came down to her waist.
zh: 我看到一个女孩，她的头发垂到腰间。

en: My hair is so messy!
zh: 我的头发太乱了！

en: Old words often take on new meanings because of inventions and technology.
zh: 由于发明和科技，旧词经常产生新的含义。

en: Inventions are born, so to speak, of necessity.
zh: 可以说，发明是应运而生的。

en: The ingenious man received the prestigious award for the first time.
zh: 这位才华横溢的人首次获得了这项享有盛誉的奖项。

en: Please limit your presentation to 30 minutes.
zh: 请将您的演示限制在30分钟内。

en: The developing world and the developed world can prevent a war from breaking out by helping each other.
zh: 发展中国家和发达国家可以通过互相帮助来防止战争爆发。

en: Developing countries suffer from difficulties of fiscal problems.
zh: 发展中国家遭受财政困难。

en: The growth in population is very rapid in developing countries.
zh: 发展中国家的人口增长非常迅速。

en: Good technicians are in short supply in the developing countries.
zh: 发展中国家非常缺乏优秀的技术人员。

en: Could you wrap it for mailing?
zh: 你能帮我把这个包起来邮寄吗？

en: I have a skin eruption.
zh: 我得了皮疹。

en: There are only five minutes till the train starts, and she hasn't appeared.
zh: 火车还有五分钟就要开了，她还没出现。

en: There are only five minutes left till the train leaves and she hasn't appeared.
zh: 火车还有五分钟就要开了，她还没出现。

en: Which is the departure platform?
zh: 在哪个站台出发？

en: If you permit me to speak, I can explain everything.
zh: 如果你允许我发言，我可以解释一切。

en: I am honored that you should ask me to speak.
zh: 您能邀请我发言，我感到很荣幸。

en: Just one part of what he said got picked up by the media and took on a life of its own.
zh: 他所说的话只有一部分被媒体报道，并且迅速传播开来。

en: The hikers were all but frozen when they were found.
zh: 当徒步旅行者被发现时，他们几乎都冻僵了。

en: Can you read phonetic signs?
zh: 你能读音标吗？

en: Except for pronunciation, everyone can speak good French.
zh: 除了发音，每个人都能说一口流利的法语。

en: With respect to pronunciation, he was the best of all the students.
zh: 就发音而言，他是所有学生中最好的。

en: Mark the words which you cannot pronounce.
zh: 把你不会读的单词标记出来。

en: A friend to everybody is a friend to nobody.
zh: 对每个人都是朋友的人，就不是任何人的朋友。

en: Don't try to be all things to all men.
zh: 不要试图满足所有人的需求。

en: I tried all possible means.
zh: 我尝试了一切可能的办法。

en: We're sunk.
zh: 我们完蛋了。

en: We're up against the wall.
zh: 我们走投无路了。

en: You should arrive at school before 8:30.
zh: 你应该在八点半之前到达学校。

en: He left for England at the beginning of August.
zh: 他在八月初动身去了英国。

en: Mr Hata told us on television some interesting stories about various animals.
zh: 羽田先生在电视上给我们讲了一些关于各种动物的有趣故事。

en: He's in his element when working on the farm.
zh: 他在农场工作时如鱼得水。

en: It is interesting to hear from someone in a different field.
zh: 听到来自不同领域的人的见解很有意思。

en: It is better not to go out of your field.
zh: 最好不要超出你的领域。

en: The field measures more than 300 acres.
zh: 这片田地有三百多英亩。

en: The field was rank with weeds.
zh: 田里杂草丛生。

en: The field is crying out for rain.
zh: 这片田地渴望下雨。

en: Your skin is breaking out.
zh: 你的皮肤在爆发。

en: It's chilly.
zh: 有点冷。

en: Exposing skin excessively to the sun causes sunburn, sometimes blisters.
zh: 过度将皮肤暴露在阳光下会导致晒伤，有时还会起水泡。

en: He stood for freedom of speech for everyone regardless of color.
zh: 他为每个人的言论自由挺身而出，不分肤色。

en: I have greasy skin.
zh: 我的皮肤很油。

en: I have dry skin.
zh: 我的皮肤很干燥。

en: The skin gradually took on a healthier look.
zh: 皮肤逐渐呈现出更健康的样子。

en: I have a serious skin problem.
zh: 我有一个严重的皮肤问题。

en: You must be quite accustomed to using chopsticks by now.
zh: 你现在一定很习惯用筷子了吧。

en: Dreams flew out of that box when it was opened: dreams of secrets written in disappearing ink and of overwhelming odors.
zh: 当那个盒子被打开时，梦想飞了出来：梦想是用消失的墨水写成的秘密和压倒性的气味。

en: May I open the box?
zh: 我可以打开盒子吗？

en: The box was heavy, but he managed to carry it.
zh: 这个盒子很重，但他设法把它搬走了。

en: The box is empty. But give it a touch.
zh: 盒子是空的。但触摸一下它。

en: The box was open and empty.
zh: 盒子是打开的，而且是空的。

en: The contents of the box are listed on the label.
zh: 盒子的内容物列在标签上。

en: I looked into the box.
zh: 我看了看盒子里面。

en: Look into the box.
zh: 看看盒子里面。

en: All the eggs in the box were broken.
zh: 盒子里的鸡蛋都碎了。

en: Some of the apples in the box were rotten.
zh: 盒子里的有些苹果烂了。

en: There are a lot of tools in the box.
zh: 盒子里有很多工具。

en: There is a doll in the box.
zh: 盒子里有一个娃娃。

en: There are some empty bottles in the box.
zh: 箱子里有一些空瓶子。

en: What is in the box?
zh: 箱子里有什么？

en: Are there any apples in the box?
zh: 箱子里有苹果吗？

en: There are some pears in the box.
zh: 箱子里有一些梨。

en: There are some eggs in the box.
zh: 箱子里有一些鸡蛋。

en: Inside the box were cuttings from newspapers and magazines.
zh: 箱子里面是剪报和杂志。

en: There are many apples in the box. Some are red and others are yellow.
zh: 箱子里有很多苹果。有些是红色的，有些是黄色的。

en: There are six apples in the box.
zh: 箱子里有六个苹果。

en: The shape of a box is usually square.
zh: 箱子的形状通常是正方形。

en: The boxes vary in size from small to large.
zh: 这些箱子的大小从小到大不等。

en: The box was too big and awkward, so I put these in a bag and brought them.
zh: 箱子太大了，很不方便，所以我把这些东西放在袋子里带来了。

en: We found all the boxes empty.
zh: 我们发现所有的箱子都是空的。

en: It is really lovely to go up Mt. Hakodate and look at the night view of Hakodate city.
zh: 登上函馆山，欣赏函馆市的夜景，真是太美好了。

en: I could not resist the lure of great profits.
zh: 我无法抗拒巨额利润的诱惑。

en: Bomb-making criminals frequently have the motive of wanting public attention.
zh: 制造炸弹的罪犯通常有想引起公众注意的动机。

en: Explosives went off with a bang.
zh: 爆炸物砰的一声爆炸了。

en: Experts have failed to come up with an explanation of why the explosion happened.
zh: 专家们未能解释爆炸发生的原因。

en: The explosion frightened the villagers.
zh: 爆炸吓坏了村民。

en: She came back ten minutes after the explosion.
zh: 她在爆炸十分钟后回来了。

en: The explosion ruled out their survival.
zh: 爆炸排除了他们生还的可能性。

en: The explosion killed several passers-by.
zh: 爆炸炸死了几名路人。

en: The explosion shook the whole building.
zh: 爆炸震动了整栋大楼。

en: There was an explosion, and before anyone could say Jack Robinson, the airplane burst into flame and fell.
zh: 发生了一起爆炸，还没等人们反应过来，飞机就燃起了火焰并坠落了。

en: Such was the explosion that the roof was blown off.
zh: 爆炸威力之大，屋顶都被掀翻了。

en: The explosion was so powerful that the roof was blown away.
zh: 爆炸威力太大了，屋顶都被炸飞了。

en: It was such a powerful explosion that the roof was blown off.
zh: 爆炸威力太大了，屋顶都被掀飞了。

en: Security at the airport has been stepped up since the bomb scare.
zh: 自从发生炸弹恐吓事件后，机场的安保措施已经加强。

en: An A-bomb is a terrible weapon.
zh: 原子弹是一种可怕的武器。

en: When the bomb was dropped, I felt the house rock back and forth.
zh: 炸弹爆炸时，我感到房子来回摇晃。

en: It was at that very moment that the bomb went off.
zh: 就在那一刻，炸弹爆炸了。

en: When the bomb exploded, I happened to be there.
zh: 炸弹爆炸时，我正好在那里。

en: The twilight came on.
zh: 黄昏降临了。

en: Back into the hole where I was born.
zh: 回到我出生的那个洞里。

en: You shouldn't read in such poor light.
zh: 你不应该在这么暗的光线下看书。

en: Her face was not clear in the poor light.
zh: 在昏暗的光线下，她的脸看不清楚。

en: I saw his face in the dim light.
zh: 我在昏暗的光线下看到了他的脸。

en: Not a few people think that all foreign-made articles are superior to ones made in this country.
zh: 不少人认为所有外国制造的商品都比本国制造的商品好。

en: Her eyes are rolled back.
zh: 她的眼睛翻白了。

en: Her gray hair makes her look older than her age.
zh: 她的灰发让她看起来比实际年龄老。

en: I'm getting more and more gray hair.
zh: 我的白头发越来越多了。

en: The swans migrate from here to Florida.
zh: 天鹅从这里迁徙到佛罗里达。

en: The swans on the river make a dreamlike scene.
zh: 河上的天鹅构成了一幅梦幻般的景象。

en: A beam of white light is split by a prism into rays of various colors.
zh: 一束白光被棱镜分成各种颜色的光线。

en: Let's make clear which is right and which is wrong.
zh: 让我们把孰是孰非弄清楚。

en: We have a black and white dog.
zh: 我们有一只黑白相间的狗。

en: Black and white television sets have gone out of date.
zh: 黑白电视机已经过时了。

en: Get it settled once and for all.
zh: 一劳永逸地解决它。

en: White wine is the usual companion of fish.
zh: 白葡萄酒通常是鱼的佐餐酒。

en: Would you like white wine or red?
zh: 您要白葡萄酒还是红葡萄酒？

en: White paint will brighten the room.
zh: 白色油漆会使房间更明亮。

en: The color white is a symbol of purity.
zh: 白色是纯洁的象征。

en: Keep away from the unlicensed taxis.
zh: 远离黑出租车。

en: The girl who is dressed in white is my fiancée.
zh: 那个穿着白色衣服的女孩是我的未婚妻。

en: The girl dressed in white is his fiancée.
zh: 那个穿着白色衣服的女孩是他的未婚妻。

en: The lady dressed in white is a famous actress.
zh: 那位穿着白色衣服的女士是一位著名的女演员。

en: The woman who wore the white clothes was out to a party.
zh: 那个穿着白色衣服的女人出去参加聚会了。

en: White doves are pretty birds.
zh: 白鸽是很漂亮的鸟。

en: We saw a white ship far away.
zh: 我们看到远处有一艘白色的船。

en: A white ship came into view.
zh: 一艘白色的船进入了视野。

en: The girl in a white uniform took my temperature.
zh: 那个穿白色制服的女孩给我量了体温。

en: A white cloud is floating in the blue sky.
zh: 一朵白云漂浮在蓝天上。

en: There were white clouds sailing in the sky.
zh: 天空中飘浮着白云。

en: I saw a white cloud sailing across the sky.
zh: 我看到一朵白云在天空中飘过。

en: A white cloud is floating in the blue summer sky.
zh: 一朵白云漂浮在蓝色的夏日天空。

en: A white yacht was sailing over the sea.
zh: 一艘白色的游艇在海上航行。

en: It's better to chill white wine before you serve it.
zh: 白葡萄酒最好冰镇后再饮用。

en: A white lily is very beautiful to look at.
zh: 白色的百合花非常漂亮。

en: I like the one with a white belt.
zh: 我喜欢那条带白色腰带的。

en: The white boat went down the stream.
zh: 那艘白色的船顺流而下。

en: The white parasol is hers.
zh: 那把白色的阳伞是她的。

en: There is a white dove on the roof.
zh: 屋顶上有一只白色的鸽子。

en: The girl wearing a white dress is my sister.
zh: 那个穿着白色连衣裙的女孩是我的妹妹。

en: Is it white?
zh: 是白色的吗？

en: Do you have a dress in white?
zh: 你有一件白色的连衣裙吗？

en: At a word from the ballet master in the white suit, the room will come alive.
zh: 随着穿着白色西装的芭蕾舞大师一声令下，房间将会充满活力。

en: Do you have any shirt in white?
zh: 你们有白色的衬衫吗？

en: The white drapery does not blend with the black wall.
zh: 白色的窗帘和黑色的墙壁不协调。

en: Two rabbits, a white rabbit and a black rabbit, lived in a large forest.
zh: 两只兔子，一只白兔和一只黑兔，住在一片大森林里。

en: The exposition will be held for six months.
zh: 展览会将会举行六个月。

en: The exhibition will be open for another month.
zh: 展览会将会再开放一个月。

en: How far is it to the museum?
zh: 到博物馆有多远？

en: Will you show me the way to the museum?
zh: 你能告诉我怎么去博物馆吗？

en: You cannot enter the museum. It is currently under repair.
zh: 你不能进入博物馆。它目前正在维修。

en: Is this the right way to the museum?
zh: 这条路是去博物馆的正确方向吗？

en: The museum had to close due to lack of finances.
zh: 由于缺乏资金，博物馆不得不关闭。

en: I understand the museum is closed on Mondays.
zh: 我知道博物馆星期一闭馆。

en: The museum is around the corner.
zh: 博物馆就在拐角处。

en: Where is the entrance to the museum?
zh: 博物馆的入口在哪里？

en: Where's the entrance to the museum?
zh: 博物馆的入口在哪里？

en: You'll see two buildings right opposite the museum, and the restaurant is in the taller of the two.
zh: 你会看到博物馆正对面有两栋建筑，餐厅在两栋建筑中较高的一栋里。

en: There was a sprinkling of foreigners among the visitors in the museum.
zh: 在博物馆的参观者中，有一些外国人。

en: There are no live animals in the museum.
zh: 博物馆里没有活的动物。

en: Visitors were few at the museum.
zh: 博物馆的参观者很少。

en: There are some interesting exhibits in the museum.
zh: 博物馆里有一些有趣的展品。

en: You have to get on that bus to go to the museum.
zh: 你必须乘坐那辆公共汽车才能去博物馆。

en: Gambling brought about his failure.
zh: 赌博导致了他的失败。

en: The Shinkansen from Hakata pulled in just on time.
zh: 从博多开来的新干线准时到达。

en: I'll buy a through ticket to Hakata.
zh: 我要买一张到博多的直达票。

en: No one can approach him in wideness of knowledge.
zh: 在知识的广度上，没有人能与他相比。

en: Who shall decide when doctors disagree?
zh: 当医生意见不一致时，谁来决定？

en: The doctors inquired into the mystery of nature.
zh: 医生们探究了自然的奥秘。

en: Uncle asked: "What is three plus four?"
zh: 叔叔问：“三加四等于几？”

en: Keep off the flies.
zh: 把苍蝇赶走。

en: The jury's guilty verdict gave rise to widespread debate.
zh: 陪审团的有罪判决引起了广泛的辩论。

en: The jury has returned a verdict of guilty.
zh: 陪审团已作出有罪判决。

en: The jury acquitted him of the crime.
zh: 陪审团宣判他无罪。

en: The jury is hung.
zh: 陪审团意见不合。

en: The jury were asked to allow for the age of the accused.
zh: 陪审团被要求考虑到被告的年龄。

en: Sales fell short of their goal.
zh: 销售额未达到目标。

en: Sales are amazingly brisk.
zh: 销售额惊人地迅速。

en: Relative to overall sales, that of software is insignificant.
zh: 相对于总销售额而言，软件的销售额微不足道。

en: Don't worry about making lots of sales.
zh: 不要担心销售额不高。

en: We worked hard so as to increase our sales.
zh: 我们努力工作以增加我们的销售额。

en: In proportion as the sales increase, the profit will rise.
zh: 随着销售额的增加，利润也会上升。

en: The sales are slipping.
zh: 销售额正在下滑。

en: Sales fell off in the third quarter.
zh: 第三季度的销售额下降了。

en: A seller's market is a market in which goods are relatively scarce, buyers have a limited range of choice, and prices are high.
zh: 卖方市场是指商品相对稀缺，买方选择范围有限，价格较高的市场。

en: As the men walked up and down the rows of people, they shouted, "Get your dachshund sausages!"
zh: 当那些人走在人群中时，他们大声喊道：“买你的腊肠啦！”

en: I had my umbrella taken while I was shopping.
zh: 我购物的时候，伞被人拿走了。

en: You will be better off buying a new one than trying to fix it.
zh: 买一个新的比修理它更好。

en: What you cannot afford to buy, do without.
zh: 买不起的东西，就不要买。

en: She left the store because she didn't have anything else that she had to buy.
zh: 她离开了商店，因为她没有其他需要买的东西了。

en: Before deciding to buy it, I tried on the jacket to see if it would fit.
zh: 在决定购买之前，我试穿了这件夹克，看看是否合身。

en: It is up to you whether to buy it or not.
zh: 买不买由你决定。

en: Shoppers crowded the streets.
zh: 购物者挤满了街道。

en: The shoppers stood in a line.
zh: 购物者们排成一队。

en: Shoppers hurried along the sidewalk.
zh: 购物者们匆匆地走在人行道上。

en: I will call you when I have done my shopping.
zh: 我买完东西后会给你打电话。

en: Would you like to go shopping with me?
zh: 你想和我一起去购物吗？

en: As I didn't have time to go shopping today, I had to make do with a sandwich for dinner.
zh: 因为我今天没时间去购物，所以我只好用三明治当晚餐。

en: Can you do some shopping for me?
zh: 你能帮我买些东西吗？

en: Did you check all the items on the shopping list?
zh: 你检查了购物清单上的所有物品吗？

en: I would rather stay at home than go shopping.
zh: 我宁愿待在家里也不想去购物。

en: You are an angel for doing my shopping.
zh: 你真是个天使，帮我买了东西。

en: What do you say to going shopping?
zh: 你去购物怎么样？

en: I have to go shopping.
zh: 我得去购物了。

en: Would you like to come shopping with me?
zh: 你想和我一起去购物吗？

en: Please drop by when you go out for shopping sometimes.
zh: 你出去购物的时候，请顺便过来坐坐。

zh: 由于浓雾，一个人也看不见。

en: The freight train was held up about half an hour because of a dense fog.
zh: 由于浓雾，货运列车延误了大约半小时。

en: The thick fog made it hard to see the road.
zh: 浓雾使道路难以辨认。

en: The heavy fog made it impossible for us to see anything in front of us.
zh: 大雾使我们无法看清前面的任何东西。

en: Our plane couldn't land on account of the dense fog.
zh: 由于浓雾，我们的飞机无法降落。

en: In addition to a thick fog, there was a heavy swell.
zh: 除了浓雾，还有巨浪。

en: Dense bushes concealed him.
zh: 茂密的灌木丛掩盖了他。

en: The thick fog blotted out everything.
zh: 浓雾遮蔽了一切。

en: The thick fog prevented the plane from taking off.
zh: 浓雾阻止了飞机起飞。

en: A thick fog delayed our flight.
zh: 一场大雾延误了我们的航班。

en: The dense fog made the building invisible.
zh: 浓雾使建筑物看不见了。

en: Strong coffee kept her awake all night.
zh: 浓咖啡让她整夜没睡。

en: On account of having drunk some strong coffee, she wasn't able to sleep all night long.
zh: 因为喝了浓咖啡，她整晚都睡不着。

en: I like weak coffee better than strong.
zh: 我喜欢淡咖啡胜过浓咖啡。

en: There is no profit in worrying.
zh: 忧虑于事无补。

en: Laughing troubles away is characteristic of him.
zh: 用笑声驱散烦恼是他的特点。

en: I have mucous in my stool.
zh: 我的粪便里有黏液。

en: The fuel shortage awoke the country to the need for developing atomic energy.
zh: 燃料短缺使国家意识到开发原子能的必要性。

en: Fuel economy is a big advantage of this car.
zh: 省油是这款车的一大优势。

en: Petroleum was replacing coal as fuel.
zh: 石油正在取代煤炭成为燃料。

en: There's a fuel shortage even in the Tokyo area.
zh: 即使在东京地区也存在燃料短缺。

en: There was a shortage of fuel.
zh: 燃料短缺。

en: It was brave of you to go into the burning house.
zh: 你冲进燃烧的房子里真是勇敢。

en: The firemen's face was grim when he came out of the burning house.
zh: 消防员从燃烧的房子里出来时，脸色严峻。

en: I repeat it by way of caution.
zh: 我再说一遍，以示提醒。

en: Let me remind you again that March 31st is the due date.
zh: 让我再次提醒你，3月31日是截止日期。

en: Let's take an X-ray just in case.
zh: 我们还是去拍个X光片，以防万一。

en: Enclosed is a copy of the bank transfer receipt.
zh: 随函附上银行转账收据的复印件。

en: Have something to eat just in case.
zh: 吃点东西，以防万一。

en: You must think of your old parents.
zh: 你必须想想你的老父母。

en: The old man leaned forward and asked his wife with a soft voice.
zh: 老人向前倾身，用柔和的声音问他的妻子。

en: Old Mr Smith is saving as much money as he can.
zh: 史密斯老先生正在尽可能地攒钱。

en: Her age qualifies her for the job.
zh: 她的年龄符合这份工作的要求。

en: Try to act your age.
zh: 尽量表现得成熟一点。

en: People of all ages like this song.
zh: 各个年龄段的人都喜欢这首歌。

en: We cannot ask anything about age or physical problems.
zh: 我们不能询问任何关于年龄或身体方面的问题。

en: I am eighteen years old.
zh: 我十八岁。

en: I'm 18 years old.
zh: 我18岁。

en: I am 18 years old.
zh: 我18岁。

en: I'm eighteen.
zh: 我十八岁。

en: Every person will be admitted regardless of his or her age.
zh: 每个人都会被录取，无论其年龄大小。

en: Regardless of age, everybody can apply for it.
zh: 不分年龄，人人都可以申请。

en: Age discrimination is illegal and retirement is mandatory in only a few occupations.
zh: 年龄歧视是违法的，只有少数职业强制退休。

en: When annualized, the quarterly gain represents a 4% growth.
zh: 如果按年计算，季度增长率相当于4%的增长。

en: There is no easy cure-all for old economic ills.
zh: 对于长期的经济弊病，没有简单的万灵药。

en: We must complete the bond by the end of this year.
zh: 我们必须在今年年底前完成债券。

en: I will have obtained a driver's license by the end of the year.
zh: 我将在今年年底前获得驾驶执照。

en: We shall go on reading this book until the end of the year.
zh: 我们将一直读这本书直到年底。

en: We shall go on reading this book till the end of the year.
zh: 我们将一直读这本书直到年底。

en: We'll read this book until the end of the year.
zh: 我们将读这本书直到年底。

en: We're likely to continue reading this book up to the end of the year.
zh: 我们很可能会继续读这本书直到年底。

en: We become very shorthanded at the end of the year.
zh: 在年底，我们的人手会非常短缺。

en: From year to year they were growing poorer.
zh: 他们一年比一年穷。

en: Older people are often afraid of trying new things.
zh: 老年人常常害怕尝试新事物。

en: Older people still remember the Kennedy assassination.
zh: 老年人仍然记得肯尼迪遇刺事件。

en: As is often the case with old people, my grandfather keeps early hours.
zh: 像老年人常有的情况一样，我祖父早睡早起。

en: Older couples often appreciate cash more than gifts because they neither need nor have room for them.
zh: 老年夫妇通常比礼物更喜欢现金，因为他们既不需要也不需要空间来存放礼物。

en: From year to year, pollution problems are becoming more and more serious.
zh: 年复一年，污染问题变得越来越严重。

en: From year to year, pollution is worsening.
zh: 年复一年，污染正在恶化。

en: The elder sons are now quite independent of their father.
zh: 年长的儿子们现在已经相当独立于他们的父亲了。

en: Act your age.
zh: 做符合你年龄的事。

en: The older boys are always playing tricks on him.
zh: 大一点的男孩总是捉弄他。

en: Respect is due to older people.
zh: 应该尊敬年长的人。

en: You must not take liberties with older people.
zh: 你不能对年长的人放肆。

en: The older ones do not always know more than the younger ones.
zh: 年长的人并不总是比年轻的人知道得多。

en: My annual income approximates fifteen million yen, I suppose.
zh: 我想我的年收入大约是一千五百万日元。

en: I don't want to use aging as an excuse to go soft in the middle.
zh: 我不想用年龄增长作为借口来让自己身材走样。

en: Years passed.
zh: 岁月流逝。

en: The years pass by quickly.
zh: 岁月匆匆流逝。

en: It is the case that those who live on a pension are forced to lead a hard life.
zh: 靠养老金生活的人被迫过着艰难的生活，这是事实。

en: She's a widow and a pensioner, and faces many hardships.
zh: 她是个寡妇，也是个领养老金的人，面临着许多困难。

en: Once a man, twice a child.
zh: 老来还童。

en: The old must be respected.
zh: 老人应该受到尊敬。

en: Old men are apt to forget.
zh: 老年人容易健忘。

en: An individual with an annual income of more than 15 million yen is required to file his or her final tax return in March.
zh: 年收入超过1500万日元的人需要在三月份申报最终纳税申报表。

en: How much is the annual membership fee?
zh: 年度会员费是多少？

en: Writing new year's cards is a Japanese institution.
zh: 写贺年卡是日本的一种习俗。

en: New Year's cards provide us with the opportunity to hear from friends and relatives.
zh: 贺年卡为我们提供了了解亲朋好友近况的机会。

en: The older we become, the worse our memory gets.
zh: 我们年纪越大，记忆力就越差。

en: The older you get, the less sleep you need.
zh: 你年纪越大，需要的睡眠就越少。

en: The older we grow, the poorer our memory becomes.
zh: 我们年纪越大，记忆力就越差。

en: The older you are, the more difficult it is to learn a language.
zh: 你年纪越大，学习语言就越困难。

en: The older we grow, the less innocent we become.
zh: 我们年纪越大，就越不天真。

en: They'll be more sensitive to the cold as they grow older.
zh: 随着年龄的增长，他们会对寒冷更加敏感。

en: As you get older you start to feel that health is everything.
zh: 随着年龄的增长，你开始觉得健康就是一切。

en: I wish to revisit England before I get too old.
zh: 我希望在我太老之前重游英国。

en: Old age has undermined her memory.
zh: 年老损害了她的记忆力。

en: The older we get, the weaker our memory becomes.
zh: 我们越老，记忆力就越差。

en: The older you grow, the more you tend to adhere to fixed ideas.
zh: 你越老，就越倾向于坚持固定的想法。

en: The older we grow the less innocent we become.
zh: 我们越老，就越不纯真。

en: As we grow older, our memory becomes weaker.
zh: 随着我们年龄的增长，我们的记忆力会变差。

en: As I grew older, my health declined.
zh: 随着我年龄的增长，我的健康状况下降了。

en: She became more and more beautiful as she grew older.
zh: 随着年龄的增长，她变得越来越漂亮。

en: Passions weaken, but habits strengthen, with age.
zh: 随着年龄的增长，激情减弱，但习惯增强。

en: Old and crippled, he had courage enough to do the work.
zh: 他年老体衰，但仍有足够的勇气完成工作。

en: In later years, I confess that I do not envy the white boy as I once did.
zh: 晚年，我承认我不再像以前那样羡慕白人男孩了。

en: Aged people like to keep the world the way it is. On the other hand young people love to change the world.
zh: 老年人喜欢保持世界的原样。另一方面，年轻人喜欢改变世界。

en: We should be considerate to the old.
zh: 我们应该体谅老人。

en: Now I'm older, I see things differently.
zh: 现在我老了，我看事情的方式不一样了。

en: I want to age gracefully.
zh: 我想优雅地老去。

en: Maybe it's his age but his opinions seem a little more grounded in experience than everyone else's.
zh: 也许是因为他的年龄，但他的观点似乎比其他人的更基于经验。

en: He looks very vigorous, considering his age.
zh: 考虑到他的年龄，他看起来很有活力。

en: We are not able to put a young boy in prison.
zh: 我们不能把一个年轻的男孩关进监狱。

en: We can't put a young boy in prison.
zh: 我们不能把一个年轻的男孩关进监狱。

en: He is in good health in spite of his age.
zh: 尽管他年纪大了，但他的健康状况良好。

en: Your age is beginning to tell.
zh: 你的年龄开始显现出来了。

en: Her hair became gray with the years.
zh: 她的头发随着岁月的流逝而变白了。

en: Age diminished his strength.
zh: 年龄削弱了他的力量。

en: Year followed year...
zh: 年复一年...

en: Miki fell passionately in love with someone she just met.
zh: 美纪对一个刚认识的人一见钟情。

en: I burned myself with boiling water.
zh: 我被开水烫伤了。

en: Hot water burst out.
zh: 热水喷涌而出。

en: Rainforests provide the earth with many benefits.
zh: 热带雨林为地球提供了许多益处。

en: Rainforests should be preserved.
zh: 热带雨林应该被保护。

en: The rainforests are disappearing at the rate of tens of thousands of hectares a day.
zh: 热带雨林正以每天数万公顷的速度消失。

en: Tropical rainforests produce oxygen and consume carbon dioxide.
zh: 热带雨林产生氧气并消耗二氧化碳。

en: The destruction of the rainforests affects our environment.
zh: 热带雨林的破坏影响着我们的环境。

en: Tropical rainforests are a cause for concern.
zh: 热带雨林是一个令人担忧的问题。

en: It's a tragedy that rainforests are being destroyed for the sake of profits.
zh: 为了利润而破坏热带雨林是一个悲剧。

en: The tropical sun glared down relentlessly.
zh: 热带的太阳无情地照耀着。

en: They say that in tropical countries people usually marry in their teens.
zh: 据说在热带国家，人们通常在十几岁时结婚。

en: If you study hard, you will become a good student.
zh: 如果你努力学习，你就会成为一个好学生。

en: Study hard, or you will fail in the exam.
zh: 努力学习，否则你考试会不及格。

en: They felt weary after their hard work.
zh: 他们辛勤工作后感到疲惫。

en: Application to his studies brought him excellent results in the final examination.
zh: 他努力学习，在期末考试中取得了优异的成绩。

en: Running hard is important for you.
zh: 努力跑步对你很重要。

en: They were all ears for the news.
zh: 他们都全神贯注地听着这个消息。

en: By dint of hard work he succeeded at last.
zh: 由于努力工作，他最终成功了。

en: Passion is one of her characteristics.
zh: 热情是她的特点之一。

en: The eager spectators crowded into the stadium.
zh: 热情的观众涌入体育场。

en: Don't you wish to make a flight in a hot air balloon?
zh: 你不想乘坐热气球飞行吗？

en: A frenzied feasting tells of the beginning.
zh: 疯狂的盛宴预示着开始。

en: Have you ever ridden in a hot air balloon?
zh: 你坐过热气球吗？

en: Have you taken your temperature?
zh: 你量过体温了吗？

en: Heat changes ice into water.
zh: 热量使冰变成水。

en: Heat turns water into steam.
zh: 热量使水变成蒸汽。

en: Has the fever gone down?
zh: 退烧了吗？

en: Heat expands most things.
zh: 热胀冷缩。

en: Heat is a form of energy.
zh: 热是一种能量形式。

en: Do you have a fever?
zh: 你发烧了吗？

en: I have no fever.
zh: 我没发烧。

en: I don't have a fever.
zh: 我没发烧。

en: Any fever?
zh: 发烧吗？

en: The patient was hot with fever.
zh: 病人发高烧。

en: Soon hot, soon cold.
zh: 忽冷忽热。

en: The fever has risen.
zh: 烧起来了。

en: My fever won't go away.
zh: 我一直不退烧。

en: The fever has abated.
zh: 烧退了。

en: Heat will break this chemical down into harmless gases.
zh: 高温会将这种化学物质分解成无害气体。

en: I have a fever.
zh: 我发烧了。

en: I have a high temperature.
zh: 我发高烧。

en: I've got a fever.
zh: 我发烧了。

en: Fever indicates sickness.
zh: 发烧表示生病了。

en: I have a fever and I ache all over.
zh: 我发烧了，而且全身酸痛。

en: As you have a fever, you'd better stay home.
zh: 你发烧了，最好待在家里。

en: Since you have a fever, you should stay home.
zh: 既然你发烧了，你应该待在家里。

en: I'm really out of it today. It must be because of my fever.
zh: 我今天感觉很糟糕，一定是发烧的原因。

en: Have you any fever?
zh: 你发烧吗？

en: Do you have a temperature?
zh: 你发烧了吗？

en: The hot bath relaxed my muscles.
zh: 热水浴放松了我的肌肉。

en: A hot bath and then bed.
zh: 泡个热水澡然后睡觉。

en: I've just had a hot bath, so I feel much better.
zh: 我刚泡了个热水澡，感觉好多了。

en: I refreshed myself with a hot bath.
zh: 我洗了个热水澡，精神焕发。

en: The hot bath relaxed her.
zh: 热水浴放松了她。

en: We cannot walk on the hot sand with bare feet.
zh: 我们不能光着脚在滚烫的沙子上行走。

en: During hot weather, be sure to drink lots of water.
zh: 在炎热的天气里，一定要多喝水。

en: Milk goes bad quickly in hot weather.
zh: 牛奶在炎热的天气里很快就会变质。

en: Hot soup burned her tongue.
zh: 热汤烫了她的舌头。

en: I'd like to have some hot chocolate.
zh: 我想来一杯热巧克力。

en: Don't pick up the cat.
zh: 不要抱猫。

en: There's more ways than one to kill a cat.
zh: 条条大路通罗马 (字面意思是：杀死猫的方法不止一种)

en: Observe your cat carefully. If you do so, you'll get to know your cat well.
zh: 仔细观察你的猫。如果你这样做，你会很了解你的猫。

en: When the bus swerved to miss a cat, the driver said, "That was a close one!"
zh: 当公共汽车为了避开一只猫而突然转向时，司机说：“好险啊！”

en: When the bus swerved to miss a cat, the driver said, "That was close."
zh: 当公共汽车为了避开一只猫而突然转向时，司机说：“好险。”

en: When the bus swerved to miss a cat, the driver said, "That was a close call."
zh: 当公共汽车为了避开一只猫而突然转向时，司机说：“好悬啊！”

en: He is hiding his claws.
zh: 他隐藏了他的爪子。（他隐藏了他的本性/意图）

en: Anybody and everybody wants to go abroad.
zh: 任何人，每个人都想出国。

en: My cat is thrilled with joy when she gets fish for dinner.
zh: 我的猫晚餐吃到鱼的时候高兴极了。

en: Cats are active at night.
zh: 猫在晚上很活跃。

en: A cat can see much better at night.
zh: 猫在晚上看得更清楚。

en: The cat ran up the tree.
zh: 猫跑上了树。

en: Cats can climb trees, but dogs can't.
zh: 猫会爬树，但狗不会。

en: The cat lay hidden in the bushes.
zh: 猫藏在灌木丛里。

en: The cat began to tear at the mouse it caught.
zh: 猫开始撕咬它抓住的老鼠。

en: Apart from cats, I like animals.
zh: 除了猫，我还喜欢其他动物。

en: Cats arch their backs.
zh: 猫会弓起背。

en: The cat arched its back.
zh: 猫弓起了背。

en: The cat was basking in the sun.
zh: 猫在享受阳光。

en: Cats like playing in the sun.
zh: 猫喜欢在阳光下玩耍。

en: The cat made off with a piece of fish from the kitchen.
zh: 猫从厨房偷走了一块鱼。

en: The cat sprang at the bird.
zh: 猫猛扑向那只鸟。

en: Cats have a dread of water.
zh: 猫很怕水。

en: The cat was playing with a live mouse.
zh: 猫在玩一只活老鼠。

en: The cat got through the hedge.
zh: 猫穿过了树篱。

en: The cat was licking its paws.
zh: 猫在舔爪子。

en: The cat crept toward the bird.
zh: 猫悄悄地向鸟靠近。

en: Cats are often run over by moving vehicles.
zh: 猫经常被行驶的车辆撞到。

en: Cats show emotional habits parallel to those of their owners.
zh: 猫表现出的情感习惯和它们的主人相似。

en: The cat scratched my hand.
zh: 猫抓了我的手。

en: The cat hid among the branches.
zh: 猫藏在树枝间。

en: The cat jumped in surprise.
zh: 猫吃惊地跳了起来。

en: It is said that cats can change shape.
zh: 据说猫会变形。

en: Is the cat on the chair or under the chair?
zh: 猫是在椅子上还是在椅子下？

en: A cat jumped onto the chair and lay motionless.
zh: 一只猫跳到椅子上，一动不动地躺着。

en: A cat can see in the dark.
zh: 猫在黑暗中也能看见东西。

en: Cats can see things even when it's dark.
zh: 即使在黑暗中，猫也能看见东西。

en: I realized that cats can see in the dark.
zh: 我意识到猫在黑暗中也能看见东西。

en: Cats have the ability to see in the dark.
zh: 猫有在黑暗中视物的能力。

en: Cats can see when it is dark.
zh: 猫在黑暗的时候也能看见东西。

en: Cats can see even in dark places.
zh: 猫即使在黑暗的地方也能看见东西。

en: The cat caught the rats.
zh: 猫抓住了老鼠。

en: The cat caught a mouse.
zh: 猫抓到了一只老鼠。

en: Mary asked if the cat had drunk all of the milk.
zh: 玛丽问猫是否喝光了所有的牛奶。

en: The cat chased the mouse, but couldn't catch it.
zh: 猫追赶老鼠，但没能抓住它。

en: The cat ran after the rat.
zh: 猫追着老鼠跑。

en: Cats dislike being wet.
zh: 猫不喜欢被打湿。

en: Cats hate to get wet.
zh: 猫讨厌被打湿。

zh: 我们必须取消去日本的旅行。

en: To understand Japanese culture to the full, you should learn the language.
zh: 为了充分了解日本文化，你应该学习日语。

en: Japanese literature, in spite of its beauty and riches, is as yet inadequately known in the West.
zh: 日本文学虽然美丽而丰富，但在西方仍然鲜为人知。

en: Our smile, which is understandable in the context of Japanese culture, sometimes causes a lot of confusion and is notorious among foreign people as a mysterious smile.
zh: 我们的微笑，在日本文化的背景下是可以理解的，但有时会引起很多困惑，并且在外国人中以神秘的微笑而闻名。

en: It is fun to know that the beauty of Japanese gardens can't be found in other cultures.
zh: 知道日本花园的美丽在其他文化中找不到，这很有趣。

en: All Japan is excited.
zh: 全日本都很兴奋。

en: Open your atlas of Japan to page 3.
zh: 打开你的日本地图集到第3页。

en: Where is the Japanese Embassy?
zh: 日本大使馆在哪里？

en: A network of railroads spreads all over Japan.
zh: 铁路网遍布日本。

en: Look at the car made in Japan.
zh: 看看这辆日本制造的汽车。

en: I have a watch of Japanese make, which keeps very good time.
zh: 我有一块日本制造的手表，走时很准。

en: Tokyo seems to have got the message from Washington.
zh: 东京似乎已经收到了来自华盛顿的信息。

en: The Japanese government will take measures to counter depression.
zh: 日本政府将采取措施应对经济衰退。

en: The Japanese government made an important decision.
zh: 日本政府做出了一个重要的决定。

en: The Japanese government takes a neutral attitude on the matter.
zh: 日本政府对这个问题采取中立态度。

en: The Japanese government can't cope with the problem.
zh: 日本政府无法解决这个问题。

en: Sixty percent of Japanese adult males drink alcoholic beverages on a regular basis.
zh: 百分之六十的日本成年男性经常饮用酒精饮料。

en: The idea that Japanese women are submissive and always obedient to their husbands is a lie.
zh: 日本女性顺从且总是顺从丈夫的想法是谎言。

en: A Japanese businessman bought the artwork for 200 million yen.
zh: 一位日本商人以2亿日元的价格购买了这件艺术品。

en: Japanese, be talkative!
zh: 日本人，多说话！

en: Japanese students seem not merely to be extremely reserved, but to have at times almost a complete reluctance to speak.
zh: 日本学生似乎不仅非常内向，而且有时几乎完全不愿意说话。

en: Japanese and British people usually wait at a bus stop in a queue.
zh: 日本人和英国人通常在公共汽车站排队等候。

en: Japanese eat more than just Japanese cuisine.
zh: 日本人吃的不仅仅是日本料理。

en: Japanese people are considered to be polite.
zh: 日本人被认为是很有礼貌的。

en: The Japanese are most polite when dealing with friends.
zh: 日本人和朋友交往时最有礼貌。

en: The Japanese are a brave people.
zh: 日本人是一个勇敢的民族。

en: The Japanese have dark eyes.
zh: 日本人有黑色的眼睛。

en: We often hear it said that Japanese people are conservative.
zh: 我们经常听到有人说日本人很保守。

en: The Japanese live on rice.
zh: 日本人以米饭为主食。

en: The Japanese live on rice and fish.
zh: 日本人以米饭和鱼为主食。

en: The Japanese's basic diet consists of rice and fish.
zh: 日本人的基本饮食包括米饭和鱼。

en: The basic Japanese diet consists mainly of rice and fish.
zh: 日本人的基本饮食主要包括米饭和鱼。

en: The Japanese take off their shoes when they enter a house.
zh: 日本人进屋时会脱鞋。

en: The Japanese do not always make a bow as a mark of respect.
zh: 日本人并不总是以鞠躬来表示尊重。

en: The Japanese enjoy the songs of birds and insects.
zh: 日本人喜欢鸟和昆虫的鸣叫。

en: The Japanese have a lot in common with the Chinese.
zh: 日本人和中国人有很多共同之处。

en: It is said that Japanese people are kind to people they know, but rather cold to those they don't.
zh: 据说日本人对他们认识的人很友善，但对不认识的人却很冷淡。

en: Japanese differ from American in many respects.
zh: 日本人在很多方面与美国人不同。

en: Some people say that the Japanese are a race apart.
zh: 有些人说日本人是一个独特的种族。

en: The Japanese as a whole are a rice-eating nation.
zh: 日本人总体上是一个以大米为主食的民族。

en: The Japanese are a very clean people.
zh: 日本人是一个非常爱干净的民族。

en: The Japanese are as hardworking as any people in the world.
zh: 日本人和世界上任何民族一样勤劳。

en: The Japanese are highly receptive to new ideas.
zh: 日本人非常容易接受新思想。

en: Japanese love to soak in a hot tub before bed.
zh: 日本人喜欢在睡前泡热水澡。

en: Japanese seem to prefer picking a marriage partner as much like themselves as possible, finding a job that provides security and slow but steady advancement, and putting money in the bank.
zh: 日本人似乎更喜欢选择尽可能像自己一样的结婚对象，找到一份能提供保障和缓慢但稳步晋升的工作，然后把钱存入银行。

en: The Japanese like to travel in groups.
zh: 日本人喜欢集体旅行。

en: The Japanese live mainly on rice.
zh: 日本人主要以米饭为主食。

en: The Japanese are not well trained, so far as social life is concerned.
zh: 就社交生活而言，日本人没有受到很好的训练。

en: The Japanese hesitate to regard themselves as being as rich as they are said to be.
zh: 日本人对于把自己看作像人们说的那样富有感到犹豫。

en: The Japanese live in harmony with nature.
zh: 日本人与自然和谐相处。

en: The Japanese pay more attention to the group or the organization than to the individual.
zh: 日本人更注重集体或组织，而不是个人。

en: The Japanese are an industrious people.
zh: 日本人是一个勤劳的民族。

en: Do Japanese eat a lot of fish?
zh: 日本人吃很多鱼吗？

en: Japanese people tend to rely on established authority.
zh: 日本人倾向于依赖既定的权威。

en: Japanese people exchange gifts in order to communicate.
zh: 日本人交换礼物是为了沟通。

en: Japanese people exchange gifts in order to express their feelings.
zh: 日本人交换礼物是为了表达他们的感情。

en: The Japanese are too sensitive about feelings.
zh: 日本人对感情过于敏感。

en: The Japanese are not punctual as a rule.
zh: 日本人通常不准时。

en: The Japanese pride themselves on Mt. Fuji, a cone-shaped mountain.
zh: 日本人以富士山这座锥形山为荣。

en: The Japanese are generally considered to be very industrious.
zh: 日本人通常被认为是非常勤劳的。

en: The Japanese eat rice at least once a day.
zh: 日本人每天至少吃一次米饭。

en: Japanese people take three meals a day.
zh: 日本人一天吃三顿饭。

en: Japanese eat three meals a day.
zh: 日本人一天吃三顿饭。

en: The Japanese used to live mainly on rice.
zh: 日本人过去主要以米饭为主食。

en: We often hear it said that Japanese are good workers.
zh: 我们经常听到人们说日本人是优秀的工人。

en: The Japanese are not punctual compared with the Europeans.
zh: 与欧洲人相比，日本人不准时。

en: The Japanese are often criticized for being inward looking and insufficiently international in their outlook.
zh: 日本人经常因其内向和国际视野不足而受到批评。

en: Japanese people tend to think that way.
zh: 日本人往往会那样想。

en: The Japanese have tried to learn the Western way of thinking and feeling for the past hundred years.
zh: 在过去的一百年里，日本人一直试图学习西方的思维和感受方式。

en: The Japanese make a group and tend to act together.
zh: 日本人组成一个群体，并且倾向于一起行动。

en: The Japanese eat more beef than the British do.
zh: 日本人比英国人吃更多的牛肉。

en: It is said that Japanese people don't celebrate Christmas the way Americans do.
zh: 据说日本人庆祝圣诞节的方式和美国人不一样。

en: Japanese should not forget that America is a multiracial nation.
zh: 日本人不应该忘记美国是一个多种族的国家。

en: Japanese are not so particular about religion.
zh: 日本人对宗教不太讲究。

en: The Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941.
zh: 1941年12月7日，日本人袭击了珍珠港。

en: The Japanese tend to identify themselves with the group they belong to.
zh: 日本人倾向于认同他们所属的群体。

en: During O-bon, Japanese people believe they receive a visit from an ancestor.
zh: 在盂兰盆节期间，日本人相信他们会受到祖先的拜访。

en: What do you think are the racial traits of the Japanese?
zh: 你认为日本人有哪些种族特征？

en: The average life span of the Japanese has lengthened to a great extent.
zh: 日本人的平均寿命已经大大延长。

en: Half of the Japanese people lead stressful lives.
zh: 一半的日本人过着压力很大的生活。

en: Some Japanese are shy even to the point of appearing rude.
zh: 有些日本人很害羞，甚至显得粗鲁。

en: Some Japanese are concerned about how their country looks in the eyes of foreigners.
zh: 有些日本人关心他们的国家在外国人眼中的形象。

en: Some Japanese may continue to sleep with both parents even during elementary school days.
zh: 有些日本人即使在上小学期间也可能继续和父母一起睡觉。

en: Lots of people in Japan are indifferent to politics.
zh: 在日本，很多人对政治漠不关心。

en: It is the particular environment that has shaped the Japanese mentality.
zh: 正是特定的环境塑造了日本人的心态。

en: The population of Japan is larger than that of Britain.
zh: 日本的人口比英国多。

en: It's very difficult even for a Japanese to put on a kimono.
zh: 即使是日本人也很难穿上和服。

en: There is a tendency for Japanese to want to know a certain amount of personal information about someone such as age, position and whether they are married or not, before they feel comfortable talking with a stranger.
zh: 日本人有一种倾向，在与陌生人交谈之前，他们想知道对方的一些个人信息，例如年龄、职位以及是否已婚，这样他们才会感到自在。

en: To Japanese, an American baby sleeping by himself seems lonely.
zh: 在日本人看来，一个美国婴儿独自睡觉似乎很孤独。

en: A Japanese would not have said such a thing.
zh: 日本人不会说这样的话。

en: A Japanese wouldn't do such a thing.
zh: 日本人不会做这样的事。

en: It is not always easy to distinguish the Japanese from the Chinese.
zh: 要区分日本人和中国人并不总是容易的。
